staff.name: Apothecary
staff.description: An Apothecary may be used once per match to re-roll a Casualty roll (this may include a failed Regeneration roll). This re-roll may be used on a player from either team. An Apothecary cannot be used to affect the result of a roll on the Send-off table.

staff.name: Cheerleaders
staff.description: Cheerleaders add to the team's FAME. Each Cheerleader gives a +1 modifier when making a roll to see which team receives the cheers of the crowd.

staff.name: Coach Assistants
staff.description: Assistant Coaches add to the team's FAME. Each Assistant Coach gives a +1 modifier when making a roll to see which coach's Coaching Dice will be used.
